title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 64.5 - Sale of liquor described by pledged receipts prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 64.5 - Sale of liquor described by pledged receipts prohibited

State Regulations

No licensee holding a license pursuant to section
61
or
62
of the Alcoholic Beverage Control Law, shall sell, offer for sale, agree to sell or deliver to a retail licensee
holding a license pursuant to section
63
or
64
of the Alcoholic Beverage Control Law, in
this State, any liquor described and identified by warehouse receipts, if, after the solicitation and sale of the liquor, such receipts shall have been
pledged, hypothecated or deposited for collateral security for any loan or upon
any other condition. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
64.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
